org.springframework.test.web.servlet

接口 RequestBuilder

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ConfigurableSmartRequestBuilder<B>, SmartRequestBuilder
    所有已知实现类:
    MockHttpServletRequestBuilder, MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder

    public interface RequestBuilder
    Builds a MockHttpServletRequest.

    See static factory methods in MockMvcRequestBuilders.

    从以下版本开始:
    3.2

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MockHttpServletRequest buildRequest(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Build the request.

    • 方法详细资料

      • buildRequest

        MockHttpServletRequest buildRequest(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        Build the request.
        参数:
        servletContext - the ServletContext to use to create the request
        返回:
        the request
